messages.title: ALASTAIR SAYS...
messages.content: I am a life-long Hackney resident, went to school locally and volunteer at a local homeless shelter. This election is the opportunity to stand up for what we believe in. Three in four people in Hackney North voted against Brexit, but our MP voted to trigger Article 50. We need MPs that will fight extreme Brexit and attacks on public services and the environment. I’m proud to be a product of Hackney and pledge to fight for the NHS, comprehensive education, social housing and a second vote on Brexit.

messages.title: THIS ELECTION ISN’T ABOUT THE NEXT 5 YEARS. IT’S ABOUT THE NEXT 50 YEARS.
messages.content:
The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country, and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.
Every Green vote on 8th June will help make that vision a reality.
To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment. To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services. And to put more power back in your hands through a citizens’ democracy.
If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it’s in your hands. Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future. We stand up for what matters. Vote Green Party on 8th June.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose the Government’s extreme Brexit and advocate for a second vote on Brexit.
Shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment. Build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services.
Provide properly funded public services, including comprehensive education and the NHS.
Put more power back in the hands of the citizens.
